item.description:
All members are interested in going in as a group to watch this great film and meetup there at 5:15pm there are welcomed. Those are are against or are too shy to join the group can sit where he or she wants to sit. If you do call me, please please remember that you've called me. Windsor's cell: 617-435-8177. My plan would be to do the same as before to wait for a few and then those can start a line for us somewhere. I'd wait for more and please and I'll direct you to where the rest are standing in line for us. Print the pass and you should be fine. Look in the files section to print pass.


VALKYRIE Trailer by Tom Cruise





~~~~`No pressure either~~~~~ & Sorry for the Delay
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting aside the arcades at 5pm.
item.name: VALKYRIE - BY TOM CRUISE - ADVANCE SCREENING TONIGHT
